Package utils.csv

package utils.csv
CSV persistence layer for the Internship Placement System.

This package handles all CSV file operations for data persistence:

  • CsvHandler - Interface for converting objects to CSV format
  • ApplicationCsvHandler - Implements CsvHandler<Application> for Application CSV conversion
  • InternshipCsvHandler - Implements CsvHandler<Internship> for Internship CSV conversion

Features:

  • Automatic CSV escaping for commas and quotes
  • Batch loading and saving operations
  • Individual record updates
  • Error handling for file I/O
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group
